thig6.1:1.3: cāgataṃ → āgataṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | sattaṃ → puttaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig6.1:3.2: nānuññāto → ananuññāto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig6.1:7.1: pañcasatamattā → pañcasatā paṭācārā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
